item.title: 活动主义控股公司撤回两项代理权争夺战，此前KeyCorp和Eastern公司作出调整
item.description: 控股公司资产管理公司周一表示，在两家地区性银行同意接受这家激进投资者的主要改革要求后，该公司将不再寻求在KeyCorp和Eastern Bancshares发起代理权争夺战。【原文：HoldCo Asset Management said on Monday it will not pursue proxy fights at KeyCorp or Eastern Bancshares after the two regional banks agreed to the main changes the activist investor pressed them to make.】

item.title: 据《信息》报道，Apollo与xAI即将达成34亿美元协议，用于资助人工智能芯片研发。
item.description: 据《信息报》周一援引知情人士报道，阿波罗全球管理公司即将敲定一笔约34亿美元的贷款，该贷款将用于支持一家计划购买英伟达芯片并将其租赁给埃隆·马斯克旗下xAI公司的投资工具。【原文：Apollo Global Management is close to finalizing a roughly $3.4 billion loan to an investment vehicle that plans to buy Nvidia chips and lease them to Elon Musk's xAI, The Information reported on Monday, citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 比亚迪提起诉讼，要求就特朗普对美汽车关税获得退款
item.description: 法院文件显示，中国汽车制造商比亚迪已向美国政府提起诉讼，质疑特朗普总统动用广泛权力征收关税的举措，并要求退还自去年四月以来缴纳的所有关税。【原文：Chinese automaker BYD has filed a lawsuit against the U.S. government challenging President Donald Trump's bid to use sweeping authority to impose tariffs, and requesting a refund for all levies it paid since last April, court documents show.】

item.title: 彭博社报道称，谷歌母公司Alphabet计划通过发行美国债券筹集约150亿美元资金。
item.description: 彭博新闻周一援引知情人士消息报道，谷歌母公司Alphabet计划通过发行美国高评级美元债券筹集约150亿美元资金。【原文：Alphabet is looking to raise about $15 billion from a U.S. high-grade dollar bond sale, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Workday任命联合创始人阿尼尔·布什里为首席执行官
item.description: Workday周一宣布，联合创始人阿尼尔·布什里将回归担任公司首席执行官，卡尔·埃申巴赫将立即卸任该职位。【原文：Workday said on Monday co-founder Aneel Bhusri will return as the company's CEO and Carl Eschenbach will step down from the role, effective immediately.】

item.title: 武田制药斥资17亿美元收购Iambic，深化人工智能药物研发布局
item.description: 私营企业Iambic周一宣布，已与日本武田制药达成一项价值逾17亿美元的多年期合作协议，双方将运用人工智能技术共同研发针对癌症和胃肠疾病的小分子药物。【原文：Privately held Iambic said on Monday it has entered a multi-year partnership worth more than $1.7 billion with Japan's Takeda Pharmaceutical to use artificial intelligence to help design small-molecule drugs targeting cancer and gastrointestinal diseases.】

item.title: 凯德瑞推迟季度报告提交，警示财务报告问题
item.description: 软件供应商凯德瑞尔周一推迟提交季度报告，称其预计在多个期间（包括2026财年前两个季度）的财务报告内部控制存在重大缺陷。【原文：Software provider Kyndryl on Monday delayed the filing of its quarterly report, saying it anticipates material weaknesses in its internal control over financial reporting for multiple periods, including the first two quarters of fiscal 2026.】

item.title: 巴西BTG Pactual业绩强劲，第四季度利润增长40%
item.description: 巴西贷款机构BTG Pactual周一公布了其有史以来最强劲的业绩，称其季度和全年业绩均表现强劲。【原文：Brazilian lender BTG Pactual reported what it said were its strongest results on record on Monday, citing solid performance in both the quarter and the full year.】

item.title: Novo Nordisk sues Hims & Hers over patent infringement
item.description: Novo Nordisk said on Monday it has filed a lawsuit against U.S. telehealth company Hims & Hers for infringing on the Danish group's patents.

item.title: Lilly to buy Orna Therapeutics for up to $2.4 billion
item.description: Eli Lilly will buy therapy developer Orna Therapeutics for up to $2.4 billion in cash, the companies said on Monday.

item.title: Morning Bid: Tokyo takes off
item.description: What matters in U.S. and global markets today

item.title: Freedom Holding considers HK share offering as part of growth plans, CEO says
item.description: Freedom Holding , a Kazakhstan-based financial services company, is considering a secondary public offering of shares in Hong Kong to help fund expansion plans, its CEO Timur Turlov told Reuters.

item.title: Apollo's fourth-quarter profit rises on strong inflows
item.description: Apollo Global Management reported a 13% rise in fourth-quarter profit on Monday, buoyed by inflows of fresh client money and strong debt origination.

item.title: Imec opens 2.5 bln euros chip pilot line as Europe looks to strengthen AI hand
item.description: 欧洲周一在加强其在全球芯片竞赛中的地位方面迈出重要一步。比利时研究机构imec启动了耗资25亿欧元（约合29.5亿美元）的"NanoIC"试点生产线，该项目旨在根据欧盟《芯片法案》开发超先进半导体。【原文：Europe took a step to strengthen its hand in the global chip race on Monday as Belgian research firm imec opened "NanoIC", a 2.5 billion euros ($2.95 billion) pilot line aimed at developing ultra-advanced semiconductors under the EU's Chips Act.】

item.title: Symrise称美国司法部终止反垄断调查
item.description: 西玛瑞斯公司周一表示，美国司法部对其在美国反垄断诉讼中的调查已撤销。【原文：Symrise AG said on Monday that investigations against it in U.S. antitrust proceedings by the Department of Justice have been dropped.】

item.title: 蔚来因软件问题召回创纪录的246,229辆汽车
item.description: 中国蔚来汽车因软件问题存在安全隐患，正召回246,229辆汽车，创下本土电动汽车制造商最大规模召回纪录。【原文：China's Nio is recalling 246,229 vehicles due to a software issue that poses safety hazards, marking the largest recall by a homegrown electric vehicle maker.】

item.title: 洛杉矶首例Instagram与YouTube成瘾诉讼案开庭审理
item.description: 加州州法院周一开庭审理一起诉讼，该案聚焦Instagram和YouTube是否通过令人上瘾的应用设计损害了一名女性的精神健康。此案将检验科技巨头平台是否应为伤害儿童的行为承担法律责任。【原文：A California state court case over whether Instagram and YouTube harmed a woman's mental health through addictive app design kicks off on Monday with opening statements, in a test of whether Big Tech platforms can be held liable for harming kids.】

item.title: 美国软件股暴跌引发担忧：人工智能交易正在重塑市场格局
item.description: 软件与服务行业的近期暴跌引发担忧，人们担心人工智能热潮可能正以意想不到的方式重塑市场格局，这不禁让人质疑：科技股的轮换是否预示着人工智能交易领域即将面临困境。【原文：The software and services industry's recent plunge has ignited fears that the artificial intelligence boom may be reshaping markets in unexpected ways, raising questions about whether a rotation out of technology stocks signals trouble ahead for the AI trade.】

item.title: 克罗格股价上涨，因有报道称前沃尔玛高管将出任首席执行官
item.description: Shares of Kroger rose about 6% in premarket trading on Monday after a Wall Street Journal report said the grocery chain has picked former Walmart executive Greg Foran as its CEO, a year after the ouster of Rodney McMullen.

item.title: 华尔街期货走势平淡，市场静候关键经济数据
item.description: 周一，华尔街期货走势趋稳。此前一周，受人工智能担忧拖累科技股下跌，市场整体承压。投资者正等待关键经济数据，同时关注美国央行对潜在降息的信号。【原文：Wall Street futures steadied on Monday, after a week marred by tech stock declines amid AI concerns that dragged the market lower, as investors awaited crucial economic data as well as hints from the U.S. central bank on potential rate cuts.】

item.title: 美国1月集装箱进口量下降6.8%，但笛卡尔公司表示，这一结果表明贸易正趋于正常化。
item.description: U.S. seaports in January handled 6.8% less container import volume than the year-ago month, when U.S. companies rushed in goods to front-run President Donald Trump's tariffs and sent imports soaring to a record high for the month, supply chain technology provider Descartes Systems Group said on Monday.

item.title: 印度古吉拉特邦与马斯克的星链公司签署协议
item.description: 印度古吉拉特邦周一宣布，已与埃隆·马斯克的星链公司签署意向书，将在该邦西部偏远及服务不足地区提供基于卫星的高速互联网接入服务。【原文：India's Gujarat state said on Monday that it had signed a letter of intent with Elon Musk's Starlink to provide high-speed, satellite-based internet connectivity across remote and underserved regions of the western state.】

item.title: Meta批评欧盟针对WhatsApp封杀人工智能竞争对手的反垄断举措
item.description: Meta Platforms周一抨击欧盟监管机构，此前欧盟指控这家美国科技巨头违反反垄断法规，并威胁要解除其在即时通讯服务WhatsApp上对人工智能竞争对手的封锁。【原文：Meta Platforms on Monday criticised EU regulators after they charged the U.S. tech giant with breaching antitrust rules and threaten to halt its block on AI rivals on its messaging service WhatsApp.】

item.title: 高盛称，随着并购交易复苏，2026年美国IPO募资额将激增至创纪录的1600亿美元，增幅达四倍。
item.description: 高盛分析师表示，美国股市将在2026年迎来首次公开募股（IPO）的强劲反弹，预计募资规模将翻四倍至创纪录的1600亿美元，因为SpaceX、OpenAI和Anthropic等知名企业正逐步接近公开上市。【原文：U.S. equity markets are set for a sharp rebound in IPOs in 2026, Goldman Sachs analysts said, forecasting proceeds quadrupling to a record $160 billion as marquee names such as SpaceX, OpenAI and Anthropic edge closer to public listings.】

item.title: 欧盟威胁对Meta采取临时措施，因其封锁WhatsApp上的AI竞争对手
item.description: 欧盟竞争监管机构周一指控Meta Platforms违反反垄断法规，通过封锁其即时通讯服务WhatsApp中的人工智能竞争对手，并威胁将对这家美国科技巨头采取临时措施。【原文：EU competition regulators on Monday charged Meta Platforms with breaching antitrust rules by blocking artificial intelligence rivals from its messaging service WhatsApp and threatened to impose interim measures against the U.S. tech giant.】

item.title: 渣打银行任命前瑞银银行家拉扎·贾弗里为全球私人客户销售主管
item.description: 渣打银行周一宣布任命拉扎·贾弗里为全球私人客户销售主管，该行正推动企业与投资银行部门与财富管理业务部门建立新合作关系，以服务单一家族办公室及超高净值客户。【原文：Standard Chartered said on Monday it had appointed Raza Jafree as global head of private client sales, as it sets up a new partnership between its corporate and investment bank and wealth unit to serve single-family offices and ultra-high net worth clients.】

item.title: 道达尔能源将为谷歌得克萨斯州数据中心提供太阳能电力
item.description: 法国石油巨头道达尔能源公司周一签署两项长期协议，将为谷歌位于得克萨斯州的数据中心供应太阳能电力，此举旨在满足人工智能驱动的电力需求增长。【原文：French oil major TotalEnergies on Monday signed two long-term deals to supply solar power to Google’s data centres in Texas, as it looks to tap rising electricity demand driven by artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 诺和诺德股价上涨，因Hims放弃售价49美元的减肥药
item.description: 诺和诺德在法兰克福上市的股票周一上涨4.5%，此前远程医疗公司Hims & Hers在周末撤回了其49美元复合减肥药的上市计划，该计划因诺和诺德和美国食品药品监督管理局的法律威胁而受阻。【原文：Novo Nordisk's Frankfurt-listed shares rose 4.5% on Monday after telehealth firm Hims & Hers reversed its launch of a $49 compounded weight-loss pill over the weekend, following legal threats from Novo and the U.S. Food and Drug Administration.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴超负荷运转的AI聊天机器人暂停发放优惠券，请求消费者耐心等待
item.description: 阿里巴巴旗下人工智能聊天机器人Qwen因用户量过载，已暂停发放优惠券服务，这阻碍了其推广新功能的计划——该功能旨在突破单纯答疑的局限，进一步提升购物辅助能力。【原文：Alibaba's artificial intelligence chatbot Qwen has temporarily stopped issuing coupons due to customer overload, hampering a new campaign to promote the tool's capabilities beyond simply answering questions to assist shopping.】

item.title: 中国吸尘器制造商Dreame通过超级碗广告宣传其计划中的电动汽车
item.description: 中国机器人吸尘器制造商 Dreame Technology 雄心勃勃地计划打造电动超跑，其在超级碗期间投放的30秒广告展示了即将推出的电动豪华轿车。【原文：Dreame Technology, a Chinese maker of robot vacuum cleaners with an audacious goal to build electric supercars, ran a 30-second Super Bowl commercial showcasing its planned electric luxury car.】
